rules_text: Whenever you cast a black spell, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Demon creature token. If you have 13 or less life, put a +1/+1 counter on it. If you have 6 or less life, it gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
[i]“Can't get good help? Settle for dangerous help.”
—Jay Volkan[/i]
